scripts.copy-mapbox-data: rm -rf priv/static/mapbox; mkdir -p priv/static/mapbox; cp -r node_modules/mapbox.js/theme/* priv/static/mapbox
scripts.copy-fonts-data: rm -rf priv/static/fonts; mkdir -p priv/static/fonts; cp custom_deps/fonts/daniel/daniel.ttf priv/static/fonts; cp custom_deps/fonts/christopherhand.ttf priv/static/fonts; cp -r custom_deps/fonts/archer-book priv/static/fonts;
scripts.build-assets: cp -r web/static/assets/* priv/static; npm run copy-mapbox-data; npm run copy-fonts-data;
scripts.build-js: rm -rf priv/static/js; mkdir -p priv/static/js; browserify -t babelify web/static/js/main.js > priv/static/js/main.js
scripts.watch-js: rm -rf priv/static/js; mkdir -p priv/static/js; watchify -t babelify web/static/js/main.js -o priv/static/js/main.js -dv
scripts.build-css: rm -rf priv/static/css; mkdir -p priv/static/css; sass web/static/css/base.scss priv/static/css/base.css
scripts.watch-css: rm -rf priv/static/css; mkdir -p priv/static/css; sass --watch web/static/css:priv/static/css
scripts.build: npm run build-js & npm run build-css & npm run build-assets
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css & npm run watch-bootstrap & npm run watch-assets
